页面导航

Border 边框 ​

边框样式 ​

我们提供了以下几种边框样式，以供选择。

NameThicknessDemo
Solid1px
Dashed2px
vue
<template>
  <table class="demo-border">
    <tbody>
      <tr>
        <td class="text">Name</td>
        <td class="text">Thickness</td>
        <td class="line">Demo</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td class="text">Solid</td>
        <td class="text">1px</td>
        <td class="line">
          <div />
        </td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td class="text">Dashed</td>
        <td class="text">2px</td>
        <td class="line">
          <div class="dashed" />
        </td>
      </tr>
    </tbody>
  </table>
</template>
<script lang="ts" setup>
import { cssConfig } from 'whale-ui';

</script>
<style scoped>
.demo-border .text {
  width: 15%;
}
.demo-border .line {
  width: 70%;
}
.demo-border .line div {
  width: 100%;
  height: 0;
  border-top: 1px solid v-bind('cssConfig.border.color.default');
}
.demo-border .line .dashed {
  border-top: 2px dashed v-bind('cssConfig.border.color.default');
}
</style>

圆角 ​

我们提供了以下几种圆角样式，以供选择。

No Radius
Small Radius
Large Radius
Round Radius
vue
<template>
  <div class="demo-border-radius">
    <div class="demo-item">No Radius</div>
    <div class="demo-item">Small Radius</div>
    <div class="demo-item">Large Radius</div>
    <div class="demo-item">Round Radius</div>
  </div>
</template>
<script lang="ts" setup>
import { cssConfig } from 'whale-ui';

</script>
<style scoped>
.demo-border-radius{
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  justify-content: space-around;
}
.demo-item{
  padding: 10px;
  border: 1px solid v-bind('cssConfig.border.color.default');
}
.demo-item:nth-child(2){
  border-radius: v-bind('cssConfig.border.radius.base');
}
.demo-item:nth-child(3){
  border-radius: v-bind('cssConfig.border.radius.small');
}
.demo-item:nth-child(4){
  border-radius: v-bind('cssConfig.border.radius.round');
}
</style>

阴影 ​

我们提供了以下几种阴影样式，以供选择。 default、light、lighter、dark。

defualt

light

lighter

dark

vue
<template>
  <div class="demo-border-shadow">
    <div class="demo-item"><p>defualt</p></div>
    <div class="demo-item"><p>light</p></div>
    <div class="demo-item"><p>lighter</p></div>
    <div class="demo-item"><p>dark</p></div>
  </div>
</template>
<script lang="ts" setup>
import { cssConfig } from 'whale-ui';

</script>
<style scoped>
.demo-border-shadow{
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  justify-content: space-around;
}
.demo-item{
  width: 100%;
  aspect-ratio: 1;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  margin: 30px;
}
.demo-item:nth-child(1){
  box-shadow: v-bind('cssConfig.box.shadow.default');
}
.demo-item:nth-child(2){
  box-shadow: v-bind('cssConfig.box.shadow.light');
}
.demo-item:nth-child(3){
  box-shadow: v-bind('cssConfig.box.shadow.lighter');
}
.demo-item:nth-child(4){
  box-shadow: v-bind('cssConfig.box.shadow.dark');
}
</style>
